1.title: Attack on Titan Differences - Fall of Shiganshina Arc
1.plot: Attack on Titan (Shingeki no Kyojin) started off with two of the most epic episodes in the history of anime. The Fall of Shiganshina arc covers the first two chapters of the manga and the first two episodes of the anime. However, there are many differences between the two. So we're covering those differences and more in this edition of Attack on Titan: Manga VS. Anime.

2.title: My Hero Academia Differences - Entrance Exam Arc
2.plot: My Hero Academia (Boku no Hero Academia) does a dang good job of adapting the manga into an anime. But, as perfect and as close as it is, there were some notable differences. So, we'll be discussing the Entrance Exam arc, and pointing those changes out in Anime vs. Manga - My Hero Academia.

3.title: Attack on Titan Changes in Battle of Trost Arc
3.plot: In the Attack on Titan (Shingeki no Kyojin) arc, "Battle for Trost" we get some interesting back story reveals and see the reveal of Eren's titan form. The Battle of Trost arc covers chapters 3-14 of the manga and the first half of Season 1 of the anime. However, there are many differences between the two. So we're covering those differences and more in this edition of Attack on Titan: Manga VS. Anime.

4.title: My Hero Academia (Ep. 5-6) - Quirk Apprehension Test Arc
4.plot: It's spring time and it's time for the first semester for Class-1A at U.A. First up is the Quirk Apprehension Test and if any students fail, they may get expelled?. Find out all the differences on this episode of Anime Vs. Manga.
